com.vaadin.event.LayoutEvents.LayoutClickNotifier, com.vaadin.event.MethodEventSource, com.vaadin.terminal.Paintable, com.vaadin.terminal.Sizeable, com.vaadin.terminal.VariableOwner, com.vaadin.ui.Button.ClickListener, com.vaadin.ui.Component, com.vaadin.ui.ComponentContainer, com.vaadin.ui.Layout, com.vaadin.ui.Layout.AlignmentHandler, com.vaadin.ui.Layout.MarginHandler, com.vaadin.ui.Layout.SpacingHandler, ConfirmationWindow.ButtonOkListener, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener
public class GlobalLayout
extends com.vaadin.ui.HorizontalLayout
implements com.vaadin.ui.Button.ClickListener, ConfirmationWindow.ButtonOkListener

This layout contains buttons to add or remove a user.

Version:
2.0.0
Author:
Matthias Gianfelice
